title: Borgo Medievale
description: The post-Roman settlement at Alba Fucens became an administrative center ca. A.D. 870 and remained significant as a center in Marsica until ca. 1143. The area was later subsumed by the Duchy of Spoleto.

properties.description: The post-Roman settlement at Alba Fucens. Location based on OpenStreetMap.
properties.title: OSM location of Borgo Medievale
